item.title: Bubba add a quote by Lao Tse
item.description: "Ruling a large kingdom is like cooking a small fish..." -- Lao Tse

item.title: Bubba add a quote by Rudyard Kipling
item.description: "War is an ill thing, as I surely know. But 'twould be an ill world for weaponless dreamers if evil men were not now and then slain." -- Rudyard Kipling

item.title: Bubba add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "To put the world in order, we must first put the nation in order; to put the nation in order, we must first put the family in order; to put the family in order; we must first cultivate our personal life; we must first set our hearts right." -- Confucius

item.title: Bubba add a quote by Willie Dixon
item.description: "Well, long way from home and, Can't sleep at all. You know another mule, Is kickin in your stall." -- Willie Dixon

item.title: Bubba add a quote by That Stanger guy
item.description: "Deer don't eat it, skunks don't eat it, sheep don't eat it, elk don't eat, cattle don't eat it, wooly mammoths don't eat it......" -- That Stanger guy

item.title: Bubba add a quote by a Nigerian sage
item.description: "The things you do for your self die with you, the things you do for others is your legacy" -- a Nigerian sage
